definitions.definition: An entry into a place or area that was previously uncommon; an advance beyond former borders; intrusion ; incursion .
An intrusion upon another's possessions or rights ; infringement .
That which is gained by such unlawful intrusion.
An unlawful diminution of the possessions of another.

main_definition: An entry into a place or area that was previously uncommon; an advance beyond former borders; intrusion ; incursion .
secondary_definitions: An intrusion upon another's possessions or rights ; infringement .
That which is gained by such unlawful intrusion.
( law ) An unlawful diminution of the possessions of another.
